name: Tumble Rumble
description:
Something is amiss at the Tumbler factory! The Artificial Intelligence in charge refuses to match Tumblers to their collection chutes. Company psychomechs are on their way, but until they arrive you must manually move the chutes to collect Tumblers under the time limit. The A.I. will try to stop you by blocking tubes, spawning thieving robots, speeding the countdown, and even blowing up what you've collected. We will provide tools to fight back, but be prepared for other tricks - you may have to operate in darkness, act fast in high gravity, or avoid the dangerous Sterilization Drone. How far can you progress? Our corporate profits depend on [#CONN ABRT622]~~~DO NOT OPPOSE ME~~~

FEATURES

- Four difficulty settings - try a harder game and get a starting bonus

- Top ten scores saved

- Bonus rounds

- Special levels

- Use helpers to see what's coming and where to tap, or turn them off for more points

- [#THREAD XRPT081]~~~YOU WILL FAIL~~~
